review: I have  taken the appointment   for my self and  i had met the doctor,it was for  related to my health   issue.It was quite good . Doctor was good in consulting me  .  I would like to recommend the doctor to other people.     Doctor was friendly. Medicines were prescribed by the doctor. I can rate him 4 out of 5.

I have taken appointment for my family member and  visited the hospital. Doctor has done the check up and according to that she will prescribe the medicines. Hospital staff were very cooperative and responsive with us. The main thing which we have face is that doctor charges are very more and every time we need to pay and take the appointment which is bit difficult for every one. I would like to recommend this doctor for my friends and family members.

I have taken appointment for my family member and we have visited the hospital. We know this doctor from 2012 and she is like our family doctor and we are completely 100% satisfied with the treatment provided by her. There was no wait time for us in hospital and our appointment was on time. I have recommend many of my friends and family members for this doctor.

I know this doctor from long back and I had taken appointment with this doctor and visited the hospital. ****** *** **** **** *** she know my all health concern from the beginning and I am completely 100% satisfied with her treatment and my appointment was on time. I would like to recommend this doctor for my friends and family members also.

I have taken appointment and visited the hospital. She had taken my consultation and it was not  done as accepted, first off doctor was late for 2 hours and I had to wait for 2 hours for my appointment and the will not recognize for the pervious patients also. So I would not recommend this doctor for any one.

I have taken appointment for my wife and we have visited the hospital. ****** *** **** **** *** ****** **** *** she had done the check up and with her treatment we are completely satisfied. There was no long wait for us in hospital and our appointment was taken very soon. I would to recommend this doctor for my friends and family members also.
